definition: (of a plane, ship etc) to have an accident (plane crash, shipwreck, vehicle collision etc)/to mess things up

sentences.english: Polit error is the most common cause of plane crashes.
sentences.chinese: 飛機失事最常見的原因是駕駛不當。

sentences.english: The steamer Artic was wrecked at sea.
sentences.chinese: 阿替克輪船在海上失事。

sentences.english: It was a native boat that had an accident in the waters ahead.
sentences.chinese: 在前面水域失事的是一艘土籍輪船。

sentences.english: The shipwrecked boat drifted away from the shore.
Wreck rolling stock engine driver Chen Mou have already been controled by the local communal security institution.
sentences.chinese: 失事車輛司機陳某已被當地公安機關控制。

sentences.english: The main reason that caused the accident of this plane was a malfunction of the elevator.
sentences.chinese: 這架直升飛機失事的主要原因是升降舵失靈。

sentences.english: A wrecked car is found among the rubble in Kesennuma, Japan.
sentences.chinese: 一輛失事車輛在碎石堆裏被發現，日本気仙沼。

sentences.english: Only two passengers survived the air-crash.
sentences.chinese: 這次飛機失事只有兩名乘客倖免於死。

sentences.english: The vehicle mounted the pavement and rammed into a bus stop， and then crashed into a hillside.
sentences.chinese: 失事汽車衝上行人路，撞向巴士站，再撞向山邊。

sentences.english: Sandy's trip was written of. He encountered a shipwreck.
sentences.chinese: 桑迪的旅行報廢了，他遭遇了一起船隻失事。

sentences.english: Later, they were shocked to hear of the news of shipwreck of their ship.
sentences.chinese: 後來他們震驚地知道了關於他們那條船的失事的消息。

sentences.english: We had been shipwrecked for the better part of a month.
sentences.chinese: 我們的船隻失事已經有半個多月了。

sentences.english: They are diving for gold from Spanish wreck.
sentences.chinese: 他們潛水到西班牙失事船上打撈黃金。

sentences.english: Jinhan Rong said, is not clear whether the explosion before the crash.
sentences.chinese: 金漢榮說，尚不清楚飛機失事前是否爆炸。

sentences.english: Sadly the plane crashed soon after taking off. Shu had his knee injured.
sentences.chinese: 遺憾的是，起飛後不久就失事了，蘇滿生膝蓋受傷。

definition: (of an airplane etc) to fall to the ground and crash
to fall into the ocean/to crash into the ocean
to force a plane to land
to return to the point of departure
